thread.title: Onslow Memorial Hospital Foundation awards $22,000 grant to Onslow Radiation Oncology
thread.title_full: Onslow Memorial Hospital Foundation awards $22,000 grant to Onslow Radiation Oncology

author: The Daily News Staff
title: Onslow Memorial Hospital Foundation awards $22,000 grant to Onslow Radiation Oncology
text:
The Board of Directors of the Onslow Memorial Hospital Foundation recently announced awarding a $22,000 grant to Onslow Radiation Oncology, according to a Thursday media release.
[]
Onslow Memorial Hospital Foundation awards $22,000 grant to Onslow Radiation Oncology
- By The Daily News Staff
